duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and manage a highly talented sales team focused on driving revenue, adoption, and market penetration in the IC.
Develop overall business and go-to-market strategies, collaborating with Commercial Sales, Legal, Marketing, Contracts, and Executive leadership to build and drive revenue attainment.
Lead a team of senior enterprise sale representatives with engagements at all levels of IC.
Accelerate customer adoption and customer satisfaction.
Maintain a robust sales pipeline and work with partners to extend reach and drive adoption.
Travel as required by the mission.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree and current, active US Government Security Clearance at the TS/SCI level with Polygraph
